price: (Luux) ni jedhe: “kun shamarran kiyya, Yoo kan raawwattan taataniif (isaan fuudhaa).”
arabic: قَالَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ بَنَاتِيٓ إِن كُنتُمۡ فَٰعِلِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qāla hāulāi banātī in kuntum fāʿilīna
